title: Textile Panel, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, gold foil on silk core
Technique: plain compound twill
description: Tan silk ground with upper portion in figured design of chrysanthemum in dark blue silk, kiri (pawlonia) in blue, green, and white silks and gold metallic thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile Panel, late 19th century. Medium: silk, gold foil on silk core
Technique: plain compound twill. 1937-34-6.
